content.text:
![pacgraph.svg](&XB+/ajEaUVwF7EowdO/qg4rVl0PvgzNcLPF4uKBB7v8=.sha256)

I made a few small changes to my system.

- Replaced Firefox with Epiphany (GNOME Web)
- Repackaged `ssb-patchwork-git` and `patchbay-gig` to use the system Electron
- Replaced `signal-desktop-bin` with `signal`, which uses the system Electron
- Removed a handful of software I just needed for one specific thing

cc: #archlinux
